definition: Linxia county city in Linxia Hui autonomous prefecture 臨夏回族自治州|临夏回族自治州[Lin2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Gansu
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before
the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia

sentences.english: Zhi Zhi is 8 years old , and her home is in a common country of Linxia Town in Gansu Province.
sentences.chinese: 今年8歲的芝芝家住在甘肅臨夏縣的一個普通的農村。
